sn35.128:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
sn35.128:4.2: Then the householder Soṇa went up to the Buddha,
sn35.128:4.3: bowed, sat down to one side,
sn35.128:4.5: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.128:4.6: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
sn35.128:4.7: (This should be told in full as in SN 35.118.)
